item.title: New Mexico Legislature approves bills to prop up rural health care, underwrite food assistance

item.title: Trump Notifies Congress That the U.S. Is at War with Drug Cartels
item.description: The more distant we are from an actual military threat, the more imperative it should be to obtain authorization from the people’s representatives.

item.title: After Promising Review Of Deadly Abortion Pill, FDA Greenlights A Copycat Version
item.description: The generic mifepristone manufacturer Evita Solutions wants to ‘normalize abortion’ and make it ‘accessible to all.’

item.title: Delaware University Won’t Punish Students Who Thanked Charlie Kirk Assassin In School TV Program
item.description: Sources say university officials had hoped the despicable incident would just 'go away quietly.' They were wrong.

item.title: A Trump endorsement is a bridge too far for Cuomo in New York City mayoral race
item.description: Former Gov. Andrew Cuomo made it clear Thursday that he has no interest in receiving President Trump's endorsement in the New York City mayoral race.

item.description: The famous author, naturally, saw right through the actress’s artifice.

item.title: States Should Beware Legal ‘Double-Dipping’
